title: Advantage, disadvantage of fed., unitary systems

content.question: Both unitary and federal systems may decentralize power. (a) Define a unitary system. (b) Describe how Great Britain has decentralized power since 1997. (c) Define federalism. (d) Explain how Mexico’s political system limited the decentralization of power prior to 2000. (e) Explain one advantage of decentralization for public policy. Explain one disadvantage of decentralization for public policy.
